description: Fourniture et livraison de mobilier de bureau. The Senate of Canada is seeking bids to establish a contract agreement for the supply and delivery of various pieces of furniture.
full_summary:
Title: **Supply and Delivery of Office Furniture**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01008346 (amendment 3)

**Solicitation Number:** SEN-032 22/23 SENATE

**Publication Date:** 2022-09-27

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-28T11:00:00 (closed)

**Contract Description:**

The Senate of Canada is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply and delivery of various pieces of office furniture. The period of the resulting standing offer agreement will be for two (2) years with three (3) one-year option periods.

**Scope of Work:**

The contract includes the supply and delivery of furniture as outlined in Annex “A” – Statement of Requirement and Appendix “A” – Various Streams. Bidders may submit alternative proposals for specific items.

**Site Visit:**

A site visit will be held on October 3, 2022 at 11:00 EDT for bidders who wish to view the furniture. The site visit will take place at the Chambers Building, 40 Elgin Street, Ottawa.

**Contact Information:**

* Remy Duerto
* Phone: 613-995-8888
* Email: [Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca)

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca by the tender closing date.

**Sampling Documents:**

* Annex “A” – Statement of Requirement
* Appendix “A” – Various Streams
* Addendum 1, dated 2022-09-28
* Addendum 2, dated 2022-10-13
* Addendum 3, dated 2022-10-18

**Trade Agreements:**

This RFSO is not subject to any trade agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity:**

Canada

**Regions of Delivery:**

Canada

**Attachment:**

 [Four attached documents (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022...)

I rewrote your 'text to columns') as well, some parts that weren't clear, I paraphrased, therefore maintaining the original meaning of the original contractor's text. The rewritten markdown text formats is proper and easy to understand.
